title: Story of Mojang
author: alduin
txt_content:
本帖最后由 alduin 于 2012-12-27 12:59 编辑 

If you liked this game, or if you are an independent game developer, you must not miss this video.If you know what I said, you may be able to understand video.It is really awesome.Video is no Chinese subtitles.无中文字幕(迟早会有的)昨晚看了一遍,相当不错的视频.


http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNDkyNTUyNjUy.html
